Html:
I'm so tired of the harsh moderation over at Stack Overflow. Is there a better place to have general discussions about Typescript and best practices where questions aren't downvoted if they don't directly relate to a question that is within their overly-narrow scope?

For instance:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32999407/organizing-typescript-project-output

Other languages have great forum communities where open ended discussions are allowed to take place, I wish Typescript did.
